about_the_game:
Overview

Drug Lords is a strategy game, where you must move from location to location, find the best price to buy and then move to another location till you find the best price to sell your "merchandise".
While you move from one place to another, you will find yourself against random encounters that will help you get more "merchandise", make you lose it, or challenge you even more, by making you defend your life for it.

But fear not.
You are not alone. you will have your two loyal friends to help you. Scarlet the Sniper and Pete the crazy bomber.

Characters

  • The Leader

    With A wide arsenal of weapons, the Leader is your many character. This is the only character that is directly controlled by the player.
  • Scarlet the Sniper

    With her powerful snipping ability Scarlet will do single target heavy damage to anyone trying to steal your "merchandise"
  • Pete the crazy bomber

    Heavy area damage is to be expected from Pete. But why Crazy? Can he be trusted?? what will happen if something goes wrong with his contraptions?

Playability

This is a "never ending" game.
Everytime you play it, you will get a unique experience, since the events, the prices and the drops will be different.

content_descriptors.notes:
The point of the game is to buy drugs cheap and sell high. 
There is no actual imaging of drugs, drug addicts or drug use.
But the following names appear in the game.
Weed, Heroin, Cocaine, Meth, XTC.
